alert.note: Alert for Colbert (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 30 at 1:24AM CST until November 30 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Alabama, including the following counties, Colbert, Lauderdale and Lawrence. * WHEN...Until 315 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 123 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Rogersville, Killen, Town Creek, Cherokee, Leighton, Courtland, St. Florian, North Courtland, Colbert Heights, Northwest Alabama Regional Airport, Pride Landing, New Bethel, Ford City, Posey Loop, Crooked Oak and Red Rock. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
